summary: Financial trading intelligence dashboard (JAAHNAVI) for F&O stocks with option chain analysis, market scanners, candlestick patterns, sector performance tracking, live news feed, and real-time market data visualization
architectural_notes: Single-page application architecture with vanilla JavaScript (no framework dependencies)
Mock data simulation replacing backend (Redis + Node + NSE scraper)
Client-side state management with appState object
View-based routing system with sidebar navigation
Real-time data updates via setInterval (simulating WebSocket)
Sticky table headers and first columns for large datasets
Toast notification system for user feedback
Analytics engine for option chain scenario detection (Long Build Up, Short Covering, etc.)

existing_features.title: Implement authentication system with login screen accepting username 'admin' and password 'admin', displaying error for invalid credentials, and redirecting to main dashboard on success
Create dashboard view displaying market indices cards for NIFTY 50, BANK NIFTY, SENSEX, FINNIFTY, and INDIA VIX with current price, percentage change, and phase indicator (Bullish/Bearish/Neutral)

Build comprehensive option chain analyzer with 28-column table displaying CE (Calls) and PE (Puts) data including ATH, LTP, Change, VWAP, Volume, OI, ΔOI, IV, ATP, Action signals, and Scenario badges, plus analysis columns for OI_Diff, ΔOI_Diff, PCR_OI, PCR_DOI, and trend flags
Display best CE and best PE strike recommendations based on highest ΔOI values in highlighted summary cards above the option chain table
Create stock scanners for Open=High (bullish breakout) and Open=Low (bearish breakdown) patterns, filtering stocks where current price equals opening price at high or low
Create candle analysis view displaying separate panels for bullish and bearish formations, listing stocks with detected patterns and pattern names
Build sector performance view showing cards for NIFTY IT, NIFTY BANK, NIFTY AUTO, NIFTY PHARMA, NIFTY FMCG, and NIFTY METAL with percentage change and strength indicators
Implement live news ticker at top of main content area with horizontal auto-scrolling animation, displaying market headlines with 'LIVE' tags
Create watchlist management system allowing users to add stocks to watchlist, view watchlist table with price and change data, and remove stocks from watchlist
Build complete F&O stocks list view displaying table of all 200+ stocks with Symbol, Price, Change, Volume, and Add to Watchlist action button
Implement canvas-based candlestick charting engine drawing 60 candles with green/red coloring, high-low wicks, and orange moving average overlay
Add global symbol search functionality in header bar that navigates to option chain view when user presses Enter on valid F&O symbol

Implement glassmorphic dark theme UI with navy blue gradients (--bg-dark: #0f172a), translucent panels using backdrop-filter blur, radial gradient background overlays at 10%/20% and 90%/80% positions with blue and purple accent colors, border colors using rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.15), and smooth transitions on all interactive elements

Create sidebar navigation with brand header 'JAAHNAVI', navigation items for Dashboard, Watchlist, Option Chain, Open=High scanner, Open=Low scanner, All F&O List, Candle Analysis, Sectors, and News Feed, with active state highlighting and smooth transitions
Implement toast notification system displaying success messages at bottom-right with slide-up animation, auto-dismissing after 3 seconds
Add symbol dropdown selector in option chain view header allowing users to switch between different F&O stocks, updating the option chain data when selection changes
Create news feed page view displaying all market headlines in card format with newspaper emoji icons, headline text, and 'Read Analysis' action buttons
Reverse the scanner interpretation logic so that Open=High pattern indicates bearish mode and Open=Low pattern indicates bullish mode
Display all F&O stocks with current prices that are nearby their Open=High and Open=Low levels in the respective scanner views
Implement user registration functionality allowing new users to create accounts with username and password

Expand candlestick pattern detection engine in frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts to recognize 12 additional patterns: Inverse Hammer, Piercing Line, Morning Star, Three White Soldiers, Dragonfly Doji (bullish category); Hanging Man, Evening Star, Three Black Crows, Dark Cloud Cover, Gravestone Doji (bearish category); Doji, Spinning Top (neutral category)

Categorize all detected candlestick patterns in CandleAnalysisView into three distinct sections: Bullish Candles (Hammer, Inverse Hammer, Bullish Engulfing, Piercing Line, Morning Star, Three White Soldiers, Dragonfly Doji) with green styling and 'BUY/LONG Setup' bias indicator, Bearish Candles (Hanging Man, Shooting Star, Bearish Engulfing, Evening Star, Three Black Crows, Dark Cloud Cover, Gravestone Doji) with red styling and 'SELL/SHORT Setup' bias indicator, and Neutral Candles (Doji, Spinning Top) with gray/white styling and 'WAIT/NO TRADE' bias indicator

Update CandleAnalysisView to display category descriptions: 'Expect Upside Reversal / Continuation' for bullish section indicating buying pressure, 'Expect Downside Reversal / Continuation' for bearish section indicating selling pressure, and 'Indecision / Sideways' for neutral section indicating market confusion requiring confirmation

new_feature_requests.summary: Login authentication system with admin/admin credentials
Dashboard view with market indices (NIFTY, BANKNIFTY, SENSEX, FINNIFTY, VIX), FII/DII data, and market breadth
Option chain analyzer with 28-column table showing CE/PE data, OI analysis, IV, scenario detection, and actionable signals
Stock scanner for Open=High (bullish) and Open=Low (bearish) patterns
Candlestick pattern detection engine (Hammer, Shooting Star, Engulfing patterns)
Sector performance tracking for IT, Bank, Auto, Pharma, FMCG, Metal sectors
Live news ticker with market headlines
Watchlist management system with add/remove functionality
Complete F&O stocks list view (200+ stocks) with price, volume, and change tracking
Canvas-based candlestick charting engine with MA overlay
Real-time market data simulation with 1-second update intervals
Symbol search functionality with Enter-to-navigate
Glassmorphic dark theme UI with gradient backgrounds and backdrop filters
Add FII/DII cash flow cards and market breadth statistics displaying advance/decline counts with color-coded values

Generate option chain data using analytics engine that calculates strike prices around ATM (±500 in 100 increments), computes realistic CE/PE prices based on distance from spot, generates OI and ΔOI values, determines scenario analysis from price and OI changes, and provides actionable signals

Implement candlestick pattern detection engine recognizing Hammer (bullish), Shooting Star (bearish), Bullish Engulfing, and Bearish Engulfing patterns based on body-to-wick ratios and price relationships
Create real-time market data simulation system updating all stock prices, changes, high/low values, and VWAP every 1 second using random walk algorithm

Style option chain table with sticky headers, sticky first column (symbol), green CE section header, red PE section header, centered and highlighted strike column, and horizontal scroll for wide 28-column layout
Reverse scanner logic: Open=High indicates bearish mode, Open=Low indicates bullish mode
Show all F&O stocks with prices near current market price at Open=High and Open=Low levels
Implement user registration/sign-up functionality to create new accounts

Expand candlestick pattern detection to include Inverse Hammer, Piercing Line, Morning Star, Three White Soldiers, Dragonfly Doji, Hanging Man, Evening Star, Three Black Crows, Dark Cloud Cover, Gravestone Doji, Doji, and Spinning Top patterns

Categorize detected candlestick patterns into three types: Bullish (reversal/continuation), Bearish (reversal/continuation), and Neutral (indecision) with bias indicators (BUY/LONG, SELL/SHORT, WAIT/NO TRADE)
